p: For the measurement of response factors, the chemicals used were: l-borneol, ledol, γ-eudesmol, β-eudesmol, 1-octen-3-ol, linalool, nerolidol, 3-octanol and α-terpineol for alcohols; pentadecanal for aldehydes; camphor, zierone and xanthoxylin for ketones; hexadecanoic acid for acids; β-pinene for monoterpene hydrocarbons; α-muurolene, δ-cadinene caryophyllene and α-caryophyllene for sesquiterpene hydrocarbons; caryophyllene epoxide for oxides; 1,2-dihydro-1,1,6-trimethyl-naphthalene for aromatic hydrocarbons.
